amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 117-507 to direct the Secretary of Education to study student mental health at institutions of higher education and to issue guidance on compliance with federal law for mental health and substance use disorder conditions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Trone amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Trone.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Trone amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
